content: this pattern has a video tutorial to accompany left https //youtu be/0viwwr4yzz4 right https //youtu be/0xefovkj7yc description worked by making 2 monstera motifs joining them and then creating the bottom material 5mm hook worsted weight cotton or jute twine i used ice yarn macrame cotton http //bit ly/2xhhix5 abbreviations double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet chain - chain sts - stitches slip_stitch - slip_stitch skip - skip size available 5-6 inch pots - 71g or 100 yds gauge work round 1 it should be approx 2 5 inches +/- 1/4 inch os ok youtube tutorials left handed https //youtu be/sgijr3yp1h4 right handed https //youtu be/yifn6wm72qs standing promotion on all written patterns all of the time why just buy one get more patterns and save more buy 2 for 20% off buy 3 for 30% off buy 4 or more for 40% off youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucu27-xjgrqpr3pxsngbi3ig like us on facebook https //www facebook com/jolieknotscrochet/ join the jolie knots crochet community facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/2541380872756259/ instagram https //www instagram com/jolieknotscrochet/ hl=en
